amendment.description: To assist individuals displaced by a major disaster in locating family members.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4573 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4573 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S7475-7478) To assist individuals displaced by a major disaster in locating family members.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4573 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4573 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama.
